Boston.One Seaport Square:
One Seaport Square, or "One Seaport" is a marquee development located within the Seaport Square Master Plan in Boston, Massachusetts. It held its groundbreaking ceremony on November 14, 2014.


== Development ==
The $600 million mixed-use development spans 1,500,000 square feet (140,000 m2) and is located on 3 acres (1.2 ha) of land.
